data.title: Contemporary Agriculture
data.meta_description: Older printed versions of the journal issues (from 1953 to 2005) are in our journal archive on Faculty of Agriculture, University of Novi Sad (Serbia). If someone needs paper(s) from this older printed issues of the journal (which is not available on the website), you can contact us at:
